itemLabel: Peter Thomas, Baron Thomas of Gwydir

wikipedia_page.main: Peter John Mitchell Thomas, Baron Thomas of Gwydir,  (31 July 1920 – 4 February 2008) was a British Conservative politician. He was the first Welshman to become Chairman of the Conservative Party, serving from 1970 to 1972, and the first Conservative to serve as Secretary of State for Wales, holding that office from 1970 to 1974.
